thread.title: Noida Toll heads for biggest fall in over 11 yrs
thread.title_full: Noida Toll heads for biggest fall in over 11 yrs | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Noida Toll heads for biggest fall in over 11 yrs
text:
Noida Toll Bridge Co Ltd shares slump 13.3 percent.
It heads towards its steepest daily fall since January 2004.
Board approves a draft proposal, bringing an end to the concession period for the key Noida Toll Bridge project in 2031.
The proposal is subject to shareholdersâ€™ approval.
Recovery of any previous revenue shortfall and potential receipt of land development rights in jeopardy said dealers.
 3:51 pm
